subject: Re: Dinner tomorrow?
body:
Dinner tomorrow sounds great, friend! My evening is totally free, so let me know where and when and I’ll be there.

John

subject: Hello World!
body:
Hello friend. It’s me, John. I hope you enjoy this fake email.

John
